task.title: Install and Connect Artifactory
task.shortdesc: What we're going to do: Install Artifactory, create a repository and connect Jenkins.

step.cmd: Download the open source version of Artifactory from https://jfrog.com/open-source/ and unpack the zip file.
Right-click and run the artofactory.bat as administrator.
When Artifactory installs, open a browser and navigate to localhost:8081.
On the Welcome wizard, configure password, skip the proxy settings, and create a new generic repository.
Go to Jenkins > Manage Jenkins > Configure System and add the Artifactory URL and credentials in the Artifactory section.

info.note: Jenkins might require restart to pick up the configuration, use localhost:8080/safeRestart.
